website_summaries.verdict: The Roost Detector is one of the best devices of its kind on the market. It features the design and features of pricier devices -- with a reasonable $50 price tag.
pros: The Roost Smart Water Leak and Freeze Detector boasts killer design, reliable performance, and a reasonable price
cons: The Roost isn't waterproof, and it doesn't include a probe range extender like some competitors
I'd also like to see more integrations in the future, to fit it in with larger smart-home setups

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t connect to wifi, despite two methods available. Support is nonexistent. Can’t say how well it detects water, because it never did connect to the wifi, but another reviewer wisely noted that if the device did get wet, it would not work.
customer_reviews.author: S. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: These are working well for monitoring sites of potential leaks/floods at home.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using two of these for several months now, and I love them. The data report makes sense to me, and my testing included setting off the alarms to make sure I could hear the alarms. They worked perfectly. After suffering a flood from a leaking refrigerator last year, I am more confident of leaving my home with the Roost detection system in place now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R Small

customer_reviews.title: I tried the setup multiple times and could not get ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the setup multiple times and could not get the device connected to the Wifi (via Samsung S7). I intend to return it. Tech support tried to be helpful, so will give them credit for that. Apparently, the leak detector does not work unless it is connected to Wifi. At least if it worked as a stand alone device that made a siren sound when detecting water, it would be of some use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great...but not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward to set up. Alerts to my phone work fine, plus the app allows me to monitor room temperature and humidity. Only wish the alarm was MUCH louder...I have it installed in my basement by the hot water tank, and I can't hear it when I'm upstairs in the first floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Tech Support Was A Delight
customer_reviews.text: Update 3-16-17 Spoke with customer support and the issue was resolved quickly. Remember to remove your phone case during set-up as the case interferes with the audible tone needed for the phone and Roost to communcate. Original Post: Device Won't Connect To The Cloud. I followed instructions to the letter! If I don't receive help from Roost within 24 hours I will return. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: The Truth and Nothing But the Truth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that was very easy to set up....have recommended it to our condo association.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Avoid at all cost.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in 2018. I tried over and over to get it to work. Not only did not continuously lose contact with the wi-fi network, prompting random alerts, it consumes batteries quickly, which prompts another alert saying it has "not checked in." Overall, feels like a prototype and Roost is using real customer to do their R&D - awful.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos AA

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure about this....
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a no-cost promotion by Roost and my homeowners' insurance company. Set up is simple enough, and I've placed it by a sump pump in the basement. Even though my phone gets the same wi-fi signal, and works in that location, this device did not report back (send an email) when I tested it as suggested, by getting it wet on the bottom. Will be doing more testing later, moving it closer to the hotspot. If it works, I'll need a repeater. My only other comment is that this device is expensive at $90. There are other less costly devices that I would try first.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and have two that failed. The freeze alarm stopped working on one and when I reported to customer support (under warranty) their answer was that it doesn't monitor temperature and shouldn't be used as a freeze alarm. My other two were working fine at the time as a freeze temperature monitor and freeze alarm. After several attempts with customer service, I finally gave up. Since that time the unit has stopped sending any alerts (I tried using it for a water alarm). I'll just throw it in the trash and find something that works. At this point I still have one unit that works.
customer_reviews.author: Dublin Bob

customer_reviews.title: smooth set up
customer_reviews.text: I got this device through an offer from my homeowner's insurance company. I am giving 5 stars because set up (getting the app, setting up the account, pairing the device to my WiFi) was very easy. Everything worked on the first try. I watched the introductory video and did exactly as directed. I put it in my laundry room on the floor near my washing machine and hot water heater (lots of potential for problems right there). I will come back and update this review if I run into any issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: The Roost water detector saved my house from flooding
customer_reviews.text: Had a Roost water detector device under my water heater, the device sounded (as we were preparing to leave) as well as sent text and email that it had detected water. I was able to shut off the water and drain the heater before any damage was done. Didn't have any problems with set up or WIFI signal like other have complained about. Will buy more..
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Poor execution
customer_reviews.text: These devices are a good idea. The problem is that after a couple days they stop communicating with my home router and go into perpetual error mode. The house isn’t even that big. They need a little more gusto with being able to send and receive WiFi signals. These are not usable as they are now.
customer_reviews.author: MikeM.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Just set up two of these with a battery for my fire alarm/ carbon monoxide detector. Easy set up with ability to dial in acceptable temperature and humidity limits. Seems that you need to be careful with direction during set up, and reading them through paid off- no hiccups. I’ll try to chime in after I’ve used these for a while! UPDATE: stopped working after about a year - we tried to reset and troubleshoot but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: MGinPNW

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to connect to network
customer_reviews.text: Given the ease with which most devices are added to home networks, the process for this device is incredibly frustrating and time-consuming. I recommend getting a device like this from another company. Any other company.
customer_reviews.author: GCSCD

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me - got through USAA
customer_reviews.text: I got these through my insurance company. I was skeptical but they connected easily to wifi and the app is slick and stable. I have tested them a few time and they work great. I'm planning on buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pïece of crap and the support on the website is even worse
customer_reviews.text: Pïece of crap and the support on the website is even worse. There is other device on the market that will do a much better job. Don't even bother with this product. Had it for free, so it will go to the recycle bin. The good side, I have two aaa batteries that I needed!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Will no longer connect to WIFI and Roost won't replace it. So now it is virtually worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have one yet but I inquired about about features ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have one yet but I inquired about about features prior to purchasing. I asked if it emitted a sound on the device itself and if it can be silenced with app. It does emit a sound but I was told you cannot silence with app. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: George

product_meta.title: Roost Smart Water and Freeze Detector
product_meta.description: The Roost Smart Water Leak and Freeze Detector is a Wi-Fi-connected, multi-function sensor that detects major home problems like water leaks, humidity & freezing/high temperatures. Together with the Roost Smart Smoke Alarms, this smart leak detector provides complete coverage of major threats to your family and your property. When you connect it to your Roost App, your phone will alert you if water is detected, or humidity / temperature fall outside your preset levels.
